Who I am

- -

Hi, I'm Christopher Ament, a full-stack software engineer living in Saint Augustine, FL — America's oldest city. Originally from Fort Lauderdale, I've always been drawn to creating and problem-solving, whether I'm working with code or mixing audio tracks. + +

+

Who I am

+ +

Hi, I'm Christopher Ament, a full-stack software engineer living in Saint Augustine, FL. Originally from Fort Lauderdale, I've always been drawn to creating and problem-solving, whether I'm working with code or mixing audio tracks.

+

Outside of software, I'm a musician and an audio engineer. Music has always been a big part of my life, and when I'm not building apps, you'll find me playing guitar or working on sound projects. I'm also a proud husband and father, which means life is always filled with joy and a bit of chaos — in the best way possible.

+

I love working on projects that challenge me and allow me to grow as a developer. If you're into tech, music, or just looking to collaborate on something cool, I'd love to connect!

+
+ +
+
- Outside of software, I'm a musician and an audio engineer. Music has always been a big part of my life, and when I'm not building apps, you'll find me playing guitar or working on sound projects. I'm also a proud husband and father, which means life is always filled with joy and a bit of chaos — in the best way possible. - - I love working on projects that challenge me and allow me to grow as a developer. If you're into tech, music, or just looking to collaborate on something cool, I'd love to connect!

-
- -
-
-
-

My Approach

- -

I’m committed to delivering projects that go beyond expectations, - turning your ideas into reality. Here’s what you can expect when we collaborate:

-
    -

  1. 1. Initial Consultation

    Every project starts with an in-depth conversation to fully understand your goals and vision.

    2. - -

  2. 2. Tailored Proposal

    I’ll provide a comprehensive project proposal, complete with visual mockups and a clear roadmap for execution.

    3. - -

  3. 3. Development & Updates

    Throughout the development process, you’ll receive regular progress updates to ensure everything is on track and aligned with your expectations.

    4. - -

  4. 4. Launch & Ongoing Support

    Once your project is live, I’ll be available for any support or adjustments needed, giving you confidence and peace of mind with the final product.

    5. -
- - -
-

Non-Proprietary
Projects

-
    -
  1. - -

    Spectral Salon

    2. - -

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Welcome,

Im Chris Ament

I'm a full-stack software engineer & I like to build things.

Take a look around & feel free to contact me if you need a DEV or a SITE.

  • Who I am / My Approach
  • What I do
  • How to Reach Me

Who I am

Hi, I'm Christopher Ament, a full-stack software engineer living in Saint Augustine, FL — America's oldest city. Originally from Fort Lauderdale, I've always been drawn to creating and problem-solving, whether I'm working with code or mixing audio tracks. Outside of software, I'm a musician and an audio engineer. Music has always been a big part of my life, and when I'm not building apps, you'll find me playing guitar or working on sound projects. I'm also a proud husband and father, which means life is always filled with joy and a bit of chaos — in the best way possible. I love working on projects that challenge me and allow me to grow as a developer. If you're into tech, music, or just looking to collaborate on something cool, I'd love to connect!

My Approach

I’m committed to delivering projects that go beyond expectations, turning your ideas into reality. Here’s what you can expect when we collaborate:

  1. 1. Initial Consultation

    Every project starts with an in-depth conversation to fully understand your goals and vision.

  2. 2. Tailored Proposal

    I’ll provide a comprehensive project proposal, complete with visual mockups and a clear roadmap for execution.

  3. 3. Development & Updates

    Throughout the development process, you’ll receive regular progress updates to ensure everything is on track and aligned with your expectations.

  4. 4. Launch & Ongoing Support

    Once your project is live, I’ll be available for any support or adjustments needed, giving you confidence and peace of mind with the final product.

Non-Proprietary
Projects

  1. Spectral Salon

Let's connect!

I am currently accepting new freelance clients and interesting project opportunities

Email me at: Chrisament45@gmail.com

Or send me a message here:

  • Linkedin
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • GitHub

Elements

Text

This is bold and this is strong. This is italic and this is emphasized. This is superscript text and this is subscript text. This is underlined and this is code: for (;;) { ... }. Finally, this is a link.

Heading Level 2

Heading Level 3

Heading Level 4

Heading Level 5
Heading Level 6

Blockquote

Fringilla nisl. Donec accumsan interdum nisi, quis tincidunt felis sagittis eget tempus euismod. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus vestibulum. Blandit adipiscing eu felis iaculis volutpat ac adipiscing accumsan faucibus. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus lorem ipsum dolor sit amet nullam adipiscing eu felis.

Preformatted

i = 0;

while (!deck.isInOrder()) {
    print 'Iteration ' + i;
    deck.shuffle();
    i++;
}

print 'It took ' + i + ' iterations to sort the deck.';

Lists

Unordered

  • Dolor pulvinar etiam.
  • Sagittis adipiscing.
  • Felis enim feugiat.

Alternate

  • Dolor pulvinar etiam.
  • Sagittis adipiscing.
  • Felis enim feugiat.

Ordered

  1. Dolor pulvinar etiam.
  2. Etiam vel felis viverra.
  3. Felis enim feugiat.
  4. Dolor pulvinar etiam.
  5. Etiam vel felis lorem.
  6. Felis enim et feugiat.

Icons

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Github

Actions

  • Default
  • Default
  • Default
  • Default
